ComicInfo.Summary:
After being framed for the murder of a high-profile citizen, Mathias Lincoln is now the most wanted person in Mega-City One. But as Mathias tries to evade the Judges searching for him, Judge Dredd uncovers a shocking secret about Dr. Filth that will change everything! Don’t miss the penultimate issue of this amazing new Judge Dredd arc from Brandon Easton (STAR TREK: YEAR FIVE, M.A.S.K.) and Kei Zama (TRANSFORMERS, DEATH’S HEAD)!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Kei Zama (a) & Eva de la Cruz (c) | 1 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Variant Cover | Jonboy Meyers | 2 |
